title: Hoisin Sauce Substitute Options

items.name: Basic hoisin substitute (per 1 tbsp hoisin)
items.details: 2 tbsp soy sauce + 1 tbsp honey (or brown sugar) + 1 tsp rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar. Optionally add a small amount of peanut butter or tahini for richer texture.

items.name: Scaled substitute for 1/4 cup hoisin
items.details: 1/4 cup soy sauce + 2 tbsp honey or brown sugar + 1 tbsp rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar + 1 tsp peanut butter or tahini (optional).

items.name: Scaled substitute for 1/2 cup hoisin
items.details: 1/2 cup soy sauce + 4 tbsp honey or brown sugar + 2 tbsp rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar + 2 tsp peanut butter or tahini (optional).

items.name: Enhanced version with five-spice
items.details: Add 1/4 tsp Chinese five-spice powder to any of the above for added depth and warmth similar to authentic hoisin sauce.

notes: This substitute works well in bourbon chicken recipes. Adjust sweetness and tanginess to taste. The peanut butter/tahini adds thickness and nuttiness. Double the recipe if more sauce is needed.
